-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Playing with applicatives and dice!
--   
@package roller
@version 0.1.3

module Roller.CLI
type CLI a = Bool -> Int -> [String] -> a
withOpts :: CLI a -> IO a

module Roller.Types
data DiceExp
Die :: Int -> Int -> DiceExp
Const :: Int -> DiceExp
Sum :: DiceExp -> DiceExp -> DiceExp
instance Show DiceExp

module Roller.Parse
parse :: String -> Maybe DiceExp

module Roller.Core
main :: IO ()
roll :: DiceExp -> IO [[Int]]
